name: Blue Skies Run
description:
Blue Skies Run is a runner type tap tap mobile game where you run, jump, dash & slide in insane levels. Each varying in difficulty. Can your runner reach the end or will he jump or fall of the ledge without a parachute? Your skills will be tested to the limit in this insanely addictive runner!

* Collect bonus items to unlock a ton of unique characters to run and jump through the levels. 
* Collect coins to easily unlock the next level if you are stuck.

Run and jump trough 50 levels!! And many more are coming!!
Play with 189 characters!!

Do awesome slides and grinds over long rails! Jump or Double jump somersault over falling blocks!

What are you waiting for? Download, install and RUN!
